products.title: Splash Snow White Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Splash snow is a beautiful fresh white colour, it will work perfectly in most spaces. A real all rounder & great for brightening up any room. Electric roller blinds are perfect for more hard to reach windows and as they are completely cord free they are inherently child safe. This will also add a very modern feel when window dressing, particularly when paired with their smart hub (sold seperately).

products.description: Splash paper is a light, off white colour. products.title: Genesis White Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their genesis range comes in 6 colour variations and is the perfect choice for a modern look. This white roller blind is ideal to add a fresh feel to any room in your home and will also go with existing decor due to the neutral tone of the fabric. The electric aspect of this blind makes it easy to use and perfect for those difficult to reach windows.
